name: Tandem
description:
Tandem is a 2 player cooperative obstacle course style game where players share control of two characters who take turns riding on the other's shoulders. While one player holds up the other and controls their forward and backward movement, the second player controls their steering while riding on their shoulders.

Together players must tackle the dangers of each level while they try to collect as much treasure as possible to break the curse that keeps them bound together.
